distance.between: spans and the width of spans
distance.from sentence:
The distance between spans and the width of spans are crucial signals for coreference resolution , consistent with previous findings from other coreference models .
They contribute 3.8 F1 to the final result .

contribution.from sentence: Since coreference decisions often involve rare named entities , we see a contribution of 0.9 F1 from character - level modeling .

1.3 F1.from sentence: Ablations also show a 1.3 F1 degradation in performance without the attention mechanism for finding task - specific heads .

rule - based system.from sentence: As shown in , keeping mention candidates detected by the rule - based system over predicted parse trees ( Raghunathan et al. , 2010 ) degrades performance by 1 F1 .

oracle mentions.from sentence: With oracle mentions , we see an improvement of 17.5 F1 , suggesting an enormous room for improvement if our model can produce better mention scores and anaphoricity decisions .
